text: “Nena: “Amene ali mkusokera, (Allah) Mwini chifundo chambiri amuonjezera nthawi yamoyo kufikira azione zomwe akulonjezedwa - kapena chilango kapena kudza nthawi (ya Qiyâma) - pamenepo ndipomwe adzadziwa kuti ndani mwini kukhala pamalo poipa, ndi mwini wa ankhondo ofooka (iwo kapena Asilamu)?”
